trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.

Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.

The text that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The name that describes the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
